title: Manage Entry Gate Congestion
description: Just before an event starts, security cameras show a large crowd and long lines forming at the main entrance.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the congestion alert from the CCTV monitoring system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the problem at the main gate.

tasks.description: Check the status of other entry gates to see if they have spare capacity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees that the East and West gates have minimal lines.

tasks.description: Dispatch staff with megaphones to the main gate to direct guests to the less congested East and West gates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches staff to redirect the crowd.

tasks.description: Update the venue's social media and mobile app with a message advising guests to use the alternate gates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent posts a public message to help manage the crowd flow.
